name: World War I
description: A gritty trench-warfare force featuring engineers, snipers, medics, and early tanks — reflecting the dawn of modern mechanized combat.

field_marshal.name: Field Marshal
field_marshal.special: Strongest unit, defeated only by the Spy when attacked.
field_marshal.description: Supreme commander overseeing the front lines.

tank_commander.name: Tank Commander
tank_commander.special: Can move two spaces forward through any terrain.
tank_commander.description: Leads armored units through the mud of battlefields.

artillery_officer.name: Artillery Officer
artillery_officer.special: Can attack over one obstacle tile if an enemy is adjacent behind it.
artillery_officer.description: Commands long-range bombardments supporting infantry advances.

gas_specialist.name: Gas Specialist
gas_specialist.special: When defeated, both attacker and defender are removed (gas exposure).
gas_specialist.description: Deploys chemical weapons to disrupt entrenched enemies.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.special: Can target adjacent enemies without moving.
sniper.description: Eliminates exposed enemies with deadly precision.

trench_gunner.name: Trench Gunner
trench_gunner.description: Frontline soldier with a shotgun or machine gun for trench assaults.

rifleman.name: Rifleman
rifleman.description: Standard infantry soldier trained for prolonged trench combat.

combat_engineer.name: Combat Engineer
combat_engineer.special: Can defuse land mines and repair obstacles.
combat_engineer.description: Expert in clearing mines, repairing trenches, and demolitions.

recon_pilot.name: Recon Pilot
recon_pilot.special: Can move multiple spaces in a straight line like a scout.
recon_pilot.description: Performs aerial reconnaissance and disrupts enemy lines.

spy.name: Spy
spy.special: Can defeat the Field Marshal when attacking, weakest otherwise.
spy.description: A covert saboteur capable of assassinating officers.

field_hq.name: Field HQ
field_hq.description: The nerve center of army command; losing it means defeat.

land_mine.name: Land Mine
land_mine.special: Destroys any attacking unit except Combat Engineers.
land_mine.description: Buried explosive trap designed to protect trenches.
